p: Amidst the spread of COVID-19 and its devastating effects on populations worldwide, and with the economies of most countries in a recession, it is now a global challenge for all countries to focus on balancing health and economic concerns, as they both affect the prosperity and well-being of society. People have to understand the situation and fully cooperate with the government and COVID-19 warriors who have been working tirelessly from day one. Let us end this review by acknowledging the respect that is due every individual who is contributing to the fight against COVID-19, and hope to see all activity return to normal, and the world as a global village will be in peace.
